input_text:
Job Title: Process Engineer - PCBA

Location: Norwood, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Summary

Our client near Boston, MA is looking for a PCBA Process Engineer to add to their growing team. Candidates should come equipped with an engineering degree in the related discipline or equivalent work experience. Candidates should also have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Printed Circuit Board Assembly. Experience in mechanical or electro-mechanical engineering is definitely preferred. This is a great opportunity, for immediate consideration, please apply today!

location: NORWOOD, Massachusetts

job type: Permanent

salary: $80,000 - 100,000 per year

work hours: 8am to 4pm

education: Bachelors

Responsibilities

Proficient in establishing and resolving issues across all standard printed circuit board assembly processes. Familiarity with ISO 9001 AS9100 practices and adherence to IPC-610-A Workmanship Standards is essential. Assist in aligning production schedules to ensure customer satisfaction and meet company revenue objectives. Continuously monitor operations, leveraging training and experience to pinpoint areas for enhancement. Contribute to the generation and presentation of process metrics. Capable of managing multiple tasks with a keen sense of urgency. Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines and work autonomously with minimal supervision. Proficiency in analyzing information, presenting research findings, and maintaining accurate documentation. Skilled in addressing customer issues related to processes.

Qualifications

Experience level: ExperiencedMinimum 5 years of experienceEducation: Bachelors

Skills

PCBProcess ImprovementProcess Control

Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

At Randstad, we welcome people of all abilities and want to ensure that our hiring and interview process meets the needs of all applicants. If you require a reasonable accommodation to make your application or interview experience a great one, please contact HRsupport@randstadusa.com.

Pay offered to a successful candidate will be based on several factors including the candidate's education, work experience, work location, specific job duties, certifications, etc. In addition, Randstad offers a comprehensive benefits package, including health, an incentive and recognition program, and 401K contribution (all benefits are based on eligibility).

Applications accepted on ongoing basis until filled.

Experience Level (if available): None
